| History                 = When the [[X-Men (Earth-616)|X-Men]] visited a restaurant serving as a front for the '''Sydney Triad''' to get some information, the Triad attacked the X-Men. During the confrontation the [[Examiner (Earth-616)|Examiner]] murdered the Triad leader, [[Gow Yang Ju (Earth-616)|Gow Yang Ju]], framed the X-Men, and took leadership.{{r|X-Treme X-Men Vol 1 5}} Afterwards, the X-Men were able to get proof that it was the Examiner who murdered Gow in a conspiracy with [[Sebastian Shaw (Earth-616)|Sebastian Shaw]] to take over not only the [[Triads (Earth-616)|Triads]], but also the other major crime syndicates in [[Australia]]. It was presented to the council of the Sydney Triad, who took the Examiner into custody, and informed the X-Men that the Triad was in its debt.{{r|X-Treme X-Men Vol 1 9}}
